name: Cloud Knight Lieutenant: Yanqing (Corrupted)
description: General Jing Yuan's retainer. A gifted swordsman who hasn't even come of age.

skills.name: Rapturous Wind
skills.description: Deals Ice DMG to one designated target. Yanqing and all Flying Swords gain 1 stack of "Chilling Light" and slightly increase DMG dealt.

skills.name: Swallow Return
skills.description: Summons 4 "Flying Swords" and gains the "Sword Formation" effect. "Sword Formation" increases Yanqing's SPD and applies "Formation Core" to the "Flying Swords."

skills.name: Ironthorn
skills.description: Deals Ice DMG to one designated target, with a high chance to Freeze the target.

skills.name: Ballad of Formation Breaker
skills.description: Deals Ice DMG to one designated target and units adjacent to the target.

skills.name: Qi Advance
skills.description: Enters the Charging state. Cast "Cascading Laceration" on all targets in the next action.

skills.name: Cascading Laceration
skills.description: Deals massive Ice DMG to all targets.

skills.name: Qi Converge
skills.description: Locks on to one designated target. After 2 turns, use "Aethereal Dreamflux" on the target.

skills.name: Aethereal Dreamflux
skills.description: Continuously deals Ice DMG to one target. After using this ability, additionally deals DMG for a number of times equal to the number of "Flying Swords" on the field. After using this ability, remove all "Flying Swords" on the field.

skills.name: Cloud Knight Linebreaker
skills.description: Black Mud will appear in battle to enhance the Boss. After enhancement, "Cloud Knight Lieutenant: Yanqing (Corrupted)" will immediately use "Swallow Return."
